title: New: MOVIE – Ads
content: Having kicked up quite the fuss with their debut outing, Mr. Fist, London outfit Movie step their game up with new tracks, Ads. Another three minutes of psych leaning pop, centred around the devilishly addictive choruses, this is perfect festival music. MOVIE have well and truly arrived, and by the sounds of this, they’re here to stay. Ads is released through Skelly Records on 9 June.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
